attributes.action: Greater Lincolnshire demands the UK Government declares a Climate Emergency
attributes.additional_details:
David Attenborough's Climate Change: The Facts
Schoolchildren protests around the world
Greta Thunberg
attributes.background:
The Government has not listened to the UK Parliament and not yet declared a Climate Emergency.  This is necessary to urgently increase the significant action needed to address climate change.

Government targets are not sufficiently ambitious to provide the leadership and determination needed
